body_html: It looks like you're adding more and more ops to a graph, which is not freed when the session is closed. If that is in fact the case (you can check by making a graph and using it with graph.as_default(), and destroying it), then this is intended behavior -- the graph should survive a session.
body_text: It looks like you're adding more and more ops to a graph, which is not freed when the session is closed. If that is in fact the case (you can check by making a graph and using it with graph.as_default(), and destroying it), then this is intended behavior -- the graph should survive a session.
body: It looks like you're adding more and more ops to a graph, which is not freed when the session is closed. If that is in fact the case (you can check by making a graph and using it `with graph.as_default()`, and destroying it), then this is intended behavior -- the graph should survive a session.
